name: part_008
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of Shirogane Noel's performance of 'Starduster'. The stage is a winter cityscape with light sticks in the audience.
Instrumental transition between songs as the scene resets for the next performance.
Usada Pekora joins Shirogane Noel for a duet of 'Chicken Rice'. They are both wearing white Christmas-themed dresses with animal-ear headbands.

subtitles.original: ...からな
subtitles.english: ...I know that.

subtitles.original: 一身分つ 体の分の一の
subtitles.english: A fraction of one body's worth of

subtitles.original: 愛を
subtitles.english: Love...

subtitles.original: 愛を
subtitles.english: Love...

subtitles.original: 愛を 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Love, right now

subtitles.original: 愛を 私に
subtitles.english: Love, to me

subtitles.original: 愛を どうか
subtitles.english: Love, please

subtitles.original: 愛を 愛を 愛を 愛を
subtitles.english: Love, love, love, love...

subtitles.original: 光射さぬ星の上で
subtitles.english: On a star where light does not reach

subtitles.original: 暗闇に呑まれないように
subtitles.english: So as not to be swallowed by the darkness

subtitles.original: 一万年先の夕焼けを
subtitles.english: A sunset ten thousand years away

subtitles.original: ひとりで見てた
subtitles.english: I was watching alone

subtitles.original: きっとこの宇宙の塵と
subtitles.english: I'm sure, with the dust of this universe

subtitles.original: ずっと漂うだけなんだろう
subtitles.english: I'll probably just drift forever

subtitles.original: そうやって消えて無くなる前に
subtitles.english: Before I vanish like that

subtitles.original: どうか どうか...
subtitles.english: Please, please...

subtitles.original: 愛を 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Love, right now

subtitles.original: 愛を 私に
subtitles.english: Love, to me

subtitles.original: 愛を どうか
subtitles.english: Love, please

subtitles.original: 愛を 愛を 愛を 愛を
subtitles.english: Love, love, love, love...

subtitles.original: 愛を...
subtitles.english: Love...

subtitles.original: 愛を...
subtitles.english: Love...

subtitles.original:
チキンライス
作詞：松本人志　作曲：槇原敬之
subtitles.english:
Chicken Rice
Lyrics: Hitoshi Matsumoto / Composition: Noriyuki Makihara

subtitles.original: 親孝行って何？って考える
subtitles.english: I wonder what it means to be a good child

subtitles.original:
でもそれを考えようとすることがもう
親孝行なのかもしれない
subtitles.english: But the act of trying to think about it might already be it

subtitles.original: 子供の頃たまに家族で外食
subtitles.english: When I was a kid, we'd occasionally eat out as a family

subtitles.original: いつも頼んでいたのはチキンライス
subtitles.english: What I always ordered was chicken rice

subtitles.original:
豪華なもの頼めば二度と連れては
もらえないような気がして
subtitles.english:
I felt like if I ordered something fancy,
I'd never be taken out again

subtitles.original: 親に気を使っていたあんな気持ち
subtitles.english: That feeling of being considerate of my parents

subtitles.original: 今の子供に理解できるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if kids today can understand that

subtitles.original: 今日はクリスマス
subtitles.english: Today is Christmas

subtitles.original: 街はにぎやか お祭り騒ぎ
subtitles.english: The city is lively, a festive bustle

subtitles.original: 七面鳥はやっぱり照れる
subtitles.english: Turkey is still a bit embarrassing

subtitles.original: 俺はまだまだチキンライスでいいや
subtitles.english: I'm still fine with just chicken rice

subtitles.original: 貧乏って何？って考える
subtitles.english: I wonder what it means to be poor

subtitles.original: へこんだとこ へこんだ分だけ笑いで
subtitles.english: By the amount things were lacking,

subtitles.original: 満たすしかなかったあの頃
subtitles.english: I had no choice but to fill it with laughter back then
